title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
content: Welcome to coins.game casino. Coins.game is one of the Most Rewarding Crypto Casino. Feel free to check out the ANN thread too.We are pleased to announce the Score Prediction Contest.Prize- $2001st- $1002nd- $603rd- $40Rules & Requirements1. Predict the total goal for the top 5 leagues (EPL, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1) for the next game week.2. The top 3 closest predictions will get the reward.3. In case of a draw, winners will share the prizes.4. No multi account.5. Rewards will be credited to your coins.game account with 2x wagering requirements.6. Rules can be adjusted by coins.game and me.Posting Format1. Coins.game username2. Total Score
